system.description:
You have reached the pinnacle of fusing the powers of dedication and otherworldly patronage. You gain the following benefits:

  • You may use Divine Smite when you deal damage with Eldritch Blast, but cannot augment it with Empowered Smite or Greater Empowered Smite.

  • Your pact boon improves.

If you have Pact of the Blade, you gain the following feature: @UUID[Item.0sZxtwI03PBSGXYt]{Eldritch Smite}.

source.name: Thematic Toolkit: Judge, Jury, and Executioner
